***************************** Readme ********************************

Compliance test bit streams and decoded PCM files generated by

Susanne Ritscher				     ritscher@irt.de
Institut fuer Rundfunktechnik (IRT)		     phone: +49-89-32399-458
Floriansmuehlstr. 60, D-80939 Muenchen, Germany	     fax:   +49-89-32399-415
----------------------------------------------------------------------------


Test signal "Test32"
	"Test32" means the 32th item in the paper which title is
	"Schedule of activities for MPEG-2 Audio Compliance".


Files:	test32.mpg	(encoded bitstream)
	test32_l.pcm	(decoded pcm file, left channel)
	test32_r.pcm	(decoded pcm file, right channel)


Description:
	Layer					2
	sampling freq.				24K
	bitrate 				128 kbps
	mode					stereo
	ancillary data				no
